titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Desmodur VP LS 2253.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on 3,5-Dimethylpyrazole-blocked hexamethylene diisocyante based adduct in organic solvent (Desmodur VP LS 2253).
